text: Clarence Williams III (August 21, 1939 - June 4, 2021) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as "Linc Hayes" on the iconic "hippie" cop show The Mod Squad (1968-1973). He was nominated for a Tony Award. His last movie role was in the 2013 movie The Butler. Williams III was born on August 21, 1939 in New York City. He died of colon cancer on June 4, 2021 in Los Angeles, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Clarence Williams III at AllMovie * Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Clarence Williams III
